Primary Domain: Building agentbased market simulation models for price forecasting of realworld stocks and other securities
License: Proprietary; free evaluation version available for research and experimentation (some limitations but no expiration)
Programming Language: No programming skills required An adaptive form of genetic programming is used to create trading rules User can select functions to be used in the genetic programming engine
Operating System: Windows 2000  NT 40  XP  Vista  7  8 or any other platform that supports Microsoft Net 20 or higher
User Support: FAQ  documentation  tutorial  examples  forum  email support
3D Capabilities: yes Up to 3 agent properties can be visualized in realtime using 2D graphics and color

Primary Domain: Agentbased general purpose; also supports discrete event and system dynamics simulations
License: Proprietary; Free Personal Learning Edition available

GIS Capabilities: yes supports both tile maps from free online providers and shapefilebased maps
